meta.title: React TypeScript Template
meta.description: Modern React application template with theme switching, multi-language support and best practices

home.description: Modern React application template with theme switching, multi-language support and best practices

features.themeSystemDesc: Support for light, dark, and system theme modes
features.responsiveDesc: Excellent experience on desktop and mobile devices
features.i18nDesc: Support for Simplified Chinese and English switching

clipboard.title: Clipboard MIME Content Parser
clipboard.description: Parse and display all MIME types from clipboard in raw format at once

emptyState.title: Click "Parse Clipboard" button to get all MIME type content
emptyState.subtitle: First copy the content you want to parse, then click the button below

error.instruction: Copy content first, then return to this page and press Ctrl+V or ⌘+V

instructions.title: Usage Instructions
instructions.step1: Copy any content to your clipboard (text, HTML, images, etc.)
instructions.step3: Allow website access to clipboard in the permission popup (if any)
instructions.step3alt: Or directly press Ctrl+V to paste content
instructions.step4: View the parsed clipboard content in various formats

notice.security: Note: Due to browser security restrictions, some content may not be fully accessible.
notice.securityAlt: Note: Due to browser security restrictions, some content may require manual pasting (Ctrl+V or ⌘+V).
notice.privacy: This tool is only used to detect clipboard content and will not upload or store your data.

clipboardTool.title: Clipboard Detector
clipboardTool.description: Detect text, styles and hidden data in clipboard
